title: Auroch Digital
content: Auroch Digital is a game development company based in Bristol, UK. It previously ran the GameTheNews initiative,[2] a project that produced news games on a variety of topics, for which it was included in the 2014 Nominet 100 list of companies doing social good with technology.[3] In September 2021, Auroch Digital was acquired by Sumo Group for $8.3 million.[4]
